description: This is an ATV Trail into Ayers Lake. There is also a side trail to the top of Oak Hill. Oak Hill is very steep for an ATV. Use extreme Caution!!
directions: From the Intersection of Rote 585 and Route 104 at Hawkins Corner, head towards Hartland on Route 104 approx. 11.2 km. There will be a sign "Ayers Lake Unique Area" on the left. Take this gravel road straight into the Ayers Lake Lookout.
title: Ayers Lake
